simplesect.para: This command is found in Image>Edit/Paste....

The Paste command puts whatever is in The GIMP Clipboard from the last Copy or Cut command into the current image. The pasted section will be placed as a Floating Selection and is shown as a separate layer in the Layers Dialog .

If there is an existing selection on the canvas, it will be used to align the pasted data. Any data pasted when a selection already exists will be pasted using the selection as a center point. If the selection is to be used as a clipping region for the pasted data, this can be achieved by using the Paste Into command.
simplesect.tip: You can only have one floating selection at any one time and cannot work on a layer while there is a floating selection.

simplesect.para: Cette commande se trouve dans Image>Édition/Coller....

La commande Coller dépose dans l'image tout ce qui est dans le presse-papier depuis la dernière commande Copier ou Couper. La partie collée sera en Sélection flottante et apparaîtra en tant que calque séparé dans la boîte de dialogue Calque.
